titulo: Brasil Ride Gravel Bonito edition 2025 | Battistrada
texto:
Brasil Ride Gravel Bonito 2025 was gravel bike cycling event category stage race in Brazil, estado Mato Grosso do Sul. The  edition  Brasil Ride Gravel Bonito 2025 took place on Thursday 07 August 2025 with departure in Bonito, Mato Grosso do Sul.
Brasil Ride Gravel Bonito is offering 3 routes (129, 100, 63 km) for gravel bike
Gravel Brasil Ride Bonito is a magical gravel journey amidst the unique beauty of Bonito, in the heart of Mato Grosso do Sul. Get ready for an experience that goes beyond dusty trails and challenging kilometres - it's a combination of nature, human endeavour and family connection.
